ROOT.MACRODEF:
Configures OSPFv2 parameters within an IPv4 interface.
Use this command to configure OSPFv2 parameters under an IPv4 interface. IPv4 interface can be Ethernet interface, VLAN interface, Portchannel interface or a Loopback interface. Every OSPFv2 parameter on an interface can be associated with its specific IPv4 addresss by explicitely specifying the IPv4 address after the parameter. Specifying interface IPv4 address is an optional.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# no ip ospf interface
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 delete_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_unconfig ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name}
Unconfigures all OSPFv2 parameters within an IPv4 interface.
Use this command to unconfigures all OSPFv2 parameters under an IPv4 interface. IPv4 interface can be Ethernet interface, VLAN interface, Portchannel interface or a Loopback interface.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# no ip ospf interface
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 patch_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_area_id ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} ${area-id} ${ip-address}
Configures OSPFv2 interface area identifier.
Use this command to associate an interface into an OSPFv2 area. Area identifier can be configured only when there is an already configured OSPFv2 router within the interface VRF and there are no network commands configured within that router. Area identifier configuration on an interface will get auto unconfigured while OSPFv2 router gets unconfigured from the VRF.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf area 19 sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf area 19.0.0.1
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 delete_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_area_id ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} 0 ${ip-address}
Unconfigures OSPFv2 interface area identifier.
Use this command to unconfigure OSPFv2 interface area identifier.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# no ip ospf
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 patch_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_authentication_type ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} ${authtype} ${ip-address}
Configures OSPFv2 interface authentication type.
Use this command to enable OSPFv2 authentication type for OSPFv2 messages. Authentocation types can be clear text authentication, message-digest authentication or no authentication. Interface mode authentication type would override router mode area authentication type. Based on the configured authentication type, corresponding configured authentication key would be used for OPSFV2 message authentication.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf authentication sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf authentication message-digest sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf authentication null
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 delete_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_authentication_type ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} ${authtype} ${ip-address}
Unconfigures OSPFv2 interface authentication type.
Use this command to unconfigure OSPFv2 interface authentication type.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# no ip ospf authentication
OSPFv2

Configures OSPFv2 interface clear text authentication key.
Use this command to configure OSPFv2 clear text authentication key. Clear text authentication key can be up to eight characters long. User provided actual password will be displayed as encrypted string in show configuration comamnd displays and saved as encrypted string in configuration file. It is recomended to use only actual password and not to use encrypted string as password.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf authentication-key pa$$woRd
OSPFv2

Unconfigures OSPFv2 interface clear text authentication key.
Use this command to unconfigure OSPFv2 interface clear text authentication key.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# no ip ospf authentication
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 patch_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_bfd ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name}
Configures OSPFv2 interface BFD.
Use this command to configure OSPFv2 interface BFD. Enabling BFD will establish a BFD session between the OSPF neighbors. Any failure in BFD session will bring down the OSPFv2 session.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf bfd
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 delete_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_bfd ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name}
Unconfigures OSPFv2 interface BFD.
Use this command to unconfigure OSPFv2 interface BFD.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# no ip ospf bfd
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 patch_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_cost ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} ${interface-cost} ${ip-address}
Configures OSPFv2 interface cost.
Use this command to configure OSPFv2 interface cost.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf cost 38
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 delete_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_cost ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} 0 ${ip-address}
Unconfigures OSPFv2 interface cost.
Use this command to unconfigure OSPFv2 interface BFD.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# no ip ospf cost
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 patch_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_dead_interval ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} ${deadtype} ${deadinterval} ${hellomultiplier} ${ip-address}
sonic_cli_ospfv2 delete_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_dead_interval ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} ${deadtype} ${ip-address}
sonic_cli_ospfv2 patch_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_hello_interval ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} ${hellointerval} ${ip-address}
Configures OSPFv2 interface neighbour hello interval.
Use this command to configure OSPFv2 interface neighbour hello interval.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf thello-interval 20
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 delete_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_hello_interval ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} 0 ${ip-address}
Unonfigures OSPFv2 neighbour hello interval.
Use this command to unconfigures OSPFv2 interface neighbour hello interval.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# no ip ospf hello-interval
OSPFv2

Configures OSPFv2 interface message digest authentication key.
Use this command to configure OSPFv2 message digest authentication key. Message digest authentication key can be up to sixteen characters long. User provided actual password will be displayed as encrypted string in show configuration comamnd displays and saved as encrypted string in configuration file. It is recomended to use only actual password and not to use encrypted string as password.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf message-digest-key 10 md5 mDpa$$woRd sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf message-digest-key 19 md5 mDpa$$woRd
OSPFv2

Unconfigures OSPFv2 interface clear text authentication key.
Use this command to unconfigure OSPFv2 interface message digest authentication key.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# no ip ospf message-digest-key 10 md5
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 patch_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_mtu_ignore ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} ${ip-address}
Disables OSPFv2 MTU mismatch detection.
Use this command to disable OSPFv2 MTU mismatch detection. MTU mismatch detection is enabled by default.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf mtu-ignore
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 delete_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_mtu_ignore ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} ${ip-address}
Enables OSPFv2 MTU mismatch detection.
Use this command to enable OSPFv2 MTU mismatch detection.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# no ip ospf mtu-ignore
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 patch_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_network_type ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} ${networktype}
Configures OSPFv2 interface network type.
Use this command to configure OSPFv2 interface network type. Broadcast and Point-to-point networks types are supported. By default Network type will be broacast.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf network point-to-point sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf network broadcast
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 delete_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_network_type ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} ${networktype}
Unonfigures OSPFv2 interface network type.
Use this command to unconfigures OSPFv2 interface network type. Unconfiguring network will make network type as default type, i.e. broadcast.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# no ip ospf network
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 patch_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_priority ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} ${priorityval} ${ip-address}
Configures OSPFv2 adjacency router priority.
Use this command to configure OSPFv2 adjacency router priority.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf priority 19
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 delete_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_priority ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} 0 ${ip-address}
Unconfigures OSPFv2 adjacency router priority.
Use this command to unconfigure OSPFv2 adjacency router priority.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# no ip ospf priority
OSPFv2
sonic_cli_ospfv2 patch_openconfig_interfaces_interface_subinterfaces_subinterface_ip_ospf_config_retransmit_interval ${iface} ${vlan_name} ${po_name} ${lo_name} ${retransmitinterval} ${ip-address}

Use this command to configure OSPFv2 interface LSA retransmit interval.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf retransmit-interval 35
OSPFv2

Unonfigures OSPFv2 LSA retransmit interval.
Use this command to unconfigures OSPFv2 interface LSA retransmit interval.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# no ip ospf retransmit-interval
OSPFv2

Configures OSPFv2 interface LSA transmit delay interval.
Use this command to configure OSPFv2 interface LSA transmit delay interval.
sonic-cli(config-router-ospf)# ip ospf transmit-delay 35
OSPFv2
